sentences.en: a screening of Spielberg’s new movie
sentences.cn: 斯皮尔伯格的新片放映

sentences.en: After a screening process, any seemingly viable proposition will be tested by market research.
sentences.cn: 通过甄选, 任何表面上可行的建议都要通过市场研究予以检验.

sentences.en: After the screening the audience warmly applauded by their love that feeling.
sentences.cn: 影片放映结束后,观众用热烈的掌声表示自己的喜爱之情.

sentences.en: Britain has an enviable record on breast screening for cancer.
sentences.cn: 英国妇女的乳腺癌患病率很低，着实令人羡慕。

sentences.en: Efficient methods of vegetative propagation and improved screening techniques are also required.
sentences.cn: 高效率的无性繁殖法和改良的鉴定技术也属必需.

sentences.en: Forrester thinks they generate atomic force without the screening we use.
sentences.cn: 弗瑞斯特博士认为他们能产生一种原子能从而使得他们免受我们的攻击.

sentences.en: However, most screening tests bring with them a certain amount of errors.
sentences.cn: 然而大多数的筛选测验本身会出现一些错误.

sentences.en: If yes, please specify the types of screening and who qualifies.
sentences.cn: 如果回答为“是”, 请详述检测类型和测试人员资质.

sentences.en: In 100,000 births, a screening program would avent 187 neural tube defects.
sentences.cn: 在100,000婴儿中, 一项筛检可避免187个神经管缺陷.

sentences.en: Microarray is an effective way for high ? throughout gene screening.
sentences.cn: 基因芯片是 高通量 基因筛选的有利手段.

sentences.en: Most of the road behind the hotel was screened by an apartment block.
sentences.cn: 旅馆后面那条路的大部分都被一排公寓楼挡住了。

sentences.en: Screening is employed for removal of suspended solids of various sizes.
sentences.cn: 格筛用来去除大小不同的悬浮固体.

sentences.en: Screening separates much of the heavier trash by use of different - sized screens.
sentences.cn: 许多较重的杂质,经由各种不同的筛子筛除.

sentences.en: The number of ions needed for screening the electrical field is known as the coordination number.
sentences.cn: 屏蔽电场所需要的离子数称为配位数.

sentences.en: While the FM screening just to avoid the amplitude modulated screening technology.
sentences.cn: 而调频增网不离能很好不天制止调幅增网技艺的弊端.

sentences.en: Yeast is a single - celled organism complex to study for initial screening purposes.
sentences.cn: 选择酵母是因为酵母是单细胞生物,便于研究.

trans.tran_en: the showing of a film or television programme

trans.tran_cn: 筛（煤、矿石等）( screen的现在分词 )，审查，放映（电影），庇护
trans.tran_en: If something is screened by another thing, it is behind it and hidden by it
